title: B! Machine
description:
B! Machine - Machine Box 5CD box set

Collection of songs from the period 1992-2002. 
Disc Five is available as a separate release (with different Cat.No.ADDCD1116) 
During 2004 a Disc Six limited to 300 copies has been released to fill the empty place in the box. 
The jewel case holds all 5 CD&#039;s, plus includes alternate covers for each disc to give the chance to put them in separate cases. 
All words and music by Nate Nicoll except for: 
1.03: Words and music by Mike Hayden 
1.08, 3.08, 3.10, 4.03, 4.07, 4.11: Music by Mike Hayden 
2.05, 5.10: Words by E.Keldsen 
Discs 1 and 4 contain songs released as "Doctor With Knives", that was the name of the band composed by Nate Nicoll and Mike Hayden. 
Disc 2 contains 6 tracks from the album "Dorlotez Vous" (tracks 1-6) and all the 1st B!Machine album "Must Kill" from 1996 (tracks 07-14). 
Disc 3 contains 2 EP&#039;s released in 1996 and 1997.
